short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert highlighted text to a LMGTFY link to save to clipboard or open new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Piss off your lazy friends by quickly generating "LMGTFY" links. 

TWO METHODS OF USAGE:

1. Highlight desired google-able text
2. Right Click
3. Either copy link to clipboard or open in new tab
4. Paste link and Educate your lazy friends.

OR : 

1. Highlight desired google-able text
2. Ctlr+Shift+F (MacCtrl+Shift+F) 
3. Past link and Educate your lazy friends.
